name: Lady Shoes Memory Game Lite
description:
Memory Match Game with beautiful lady shoes.
Tap to flip shopping bags, find those with the same shoes to make them disappear. But Hurry up, because time is ticking.
3 Levels:
- Easy: find matching pairs in a 4x5 board
- Medium: find matching pairs in a 5x6 board
- Hard: find matching pairs in a 6x6 board.
More than 30 types of trendy shoes! Have fun while checking out on trendy shoes! Do not miss this app!
** CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS IN GAME CENTER **

*** LITE VERSIONS HAS ONLY ONE LEVEL AND LESSER SHOES!
*** BUY THE FULL VERSION FOR ALL THE LEVELS, ALL THE SHOES AND ALL THE FUN!


Stay updated for more shoes!
